name: DJ Whip VR
description: Use your whip to slash enemies on the dance floor while protecting yourself from deadly shots with your shield. Mix music samples with your whip, slash and dance to the music.
minimum_requirements: OS: Windows 7 SP1, Windows 8.1, Windows 10 Processor: Intel i5-4590, AMD FX 8350 equivalent or greater Memory: 2 GB RAM Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce GTX 1060, AMD Radeon RX 580 or greater Network: Broadband Internet connection Storage: 350 MB available space
